projects.title: AI-Driven Debugging Tool at Intel
projects.description: Developed AI-based log analysis using DL/LLM models, reducing manual debugging time by 30%. Built comprehensive automation framework for system-level debugging and validation.

details.impact: 30% reduction in debugging time, automated error classification

projects.title: Automation Framework (Server Platforms) at Intel
projects.description: Designed a framework to automate the validation flow using Deep Learning. Built automation framework using Raspberry Pi and relay switches for server platform testing.

details.impact: Streamlined SysDebug processes, reduced manual testing

projects.title: Prostate Cancer Research Assistant (Personal)
projects.description: Retrieval-Augmented Generation app with Streamlit, LangChain, ChromaDB, Google GenAI. Supports PDF ingestion, intelligent Q&A, and PSA trend extraction with persistent vector store. Deployed on Streamlit Cloud for public access.

details.impact: Medical research assistance, intelligent document analysis, deployed on cloud

projects.title: Agentic AI Project (Personal)
projects.description: Built a multi-agent system using crewai library for AI-powered news aggregation and analysis. The system utilizes different agents with specific roles and tasks to gather information, summarize it, and provide analysis.

projects.title: AI-Powered Diet Food Recommendation System
projects.description: Full-stack AI-powered food recommendation system that learns from user history to suggest diet-friendly products. Features intelligent product ranking, price optimization, and personalized recommendations. Deployed using modern cloud architecture.

details.impact: Intelligent food recommendations, e-commerce integration, cloud deployment

projects.title: Personal Expense Tracker with n8n Workflow
projects.description: Automated expense tracking system using n8n workflow with Telegram bot integration and AI agent. Features intelligent expense categorization, Google Sheets integration, and email notifications for comprehensive financial management.

details.impact: Automated expense tracking, intelligent categorization, financial insights

projects.title: Chrome OS Hardware Video Decoding Validation
projects.description: Contributed to improving hardware video decoding validation for tiled formats in Chrome OS. Demonstrated understanding of VA-API, display modifiers, and GPU-accelerated media stacks.

details.impact: Enhanced video processing capabilities for Chrome OS
